resources.string: Drive at a steady speed to save fuel and keep your insurance rates low!
Slow down to stay safe! Speeding increases your risk of accidents and tickets.
Sudden stops can wear out your brakes. Anticipate traffic and brake gradually!
Smooth starts save fuel and reduce wear on your car. Accelerate gently for a better drive!
Take turns at a steady speed to stay in control and keep passengers comfortable.
What You Can Do to Improve Your Driving
A dashboard icon that opens the home screen
A help icon button that opens the help screen
A car icon button that opens the trip screen
A history icon button that opens the trip history screen
How is my trip score calculated?
Your driving score is calculated based on factors such as speeding, hard acceleration, hard braking, sharp turning. External conditions like weather are also considered.
What data does the app collect?
Your speed, your g-force, your turning radius, your location, the weather, trip duration, and trip times. All data is secure.
While you are not able to delete any individual trip data (for data integrity reasons), you are able to delete you account at any time in the profile screen
What if the app crashes during a trip?
If the app crashes or you leave the app, safely pull over and stop the vehicle, then relaunch it and start a new trip. Partial trip data up to the point of failure will be saved
Can\'t Find Your Answer Here? Email Us At: support.driveguard@brookecronin.com
